item.title: Student life
item.description: Steam rose from the mug by the screen’s side, packets of cereal bars covered the table, some even covering the numpad of the keyboard. A student sat at the desk, their head leaning into their hand, their elbow firmly pressed against the table. One headphone was in the right ear and the video of a lecture occupied their screen. From behind you would not be able to tell if they were awake or asleep.

item.title: Running
item.description: The trainers in the drawer had been used once. They were an immaculate white colour with a central blue stripe across either side. Today they would get stained, today I felt empowered. I hauled myself out of my sofa, the imprint on the cushion breathed a sigh of relief as it inflated slightly. Fortunately I was already wearing gym kit as I wore gym kit most days anyway. I coughed, tied the laces and lumbered to the door.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: FirstPost my first blog post is about coding which is complicated.
